Interface TaskInterface

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AddFriendTask, GetFriendListTask, GetScoreboardTask, GetScoreTask, LoginTask, LogoutTask, MatchTask
public interface TaskInterface
extends java.lang.Runnable
The TaskInterface provides utility methods for all the tasks.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.lang.String readMsg​(java.nio.channels.SocketChannel wqClient, java.nio.ByteBuffer bBuff)
    Utility function to read a message from a NIO socket.
    static java.lang.String receiveDatagram​(java.net.DatagramSocket socket)
    Utility function to receive and read a message from a blocking UDP socket.
    void run()
    The run method.
    static void sendDatagram​(java.net.DatagramSocket socket, byte[] msg, java.net.InetSocketAddress addr)
    Utility function to send a datagram in a blocking UDP socket.
    static void writeMsg​(java.lang.String msg, java.nio.ByteBuffer bBuff, java.nio.channels.SocketChannel socket)
    Utility function to write a message in a NIO TCP socket.

  • Method Details

    • sendDatagram

      static void sendDatagram​(java.net.DatagramSocket socket, byte[] msg, java.net.InetSocketAddress addr)
      Utility function to send a datagram in a blocking UDP socket.
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket.
      msg - the message to insert in the datagram.
      addr - the InetSocketAddress address.

    • receiveDatagram

      static java.lang.String receiveDatagram​(java.net.DatagramSocket socket) throws java.net.SocketTimeoutException, java.io.IOException
      Utility function to receive and read a message from a blocking UDP socket.
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket.
      Returns:
      the red message.
      Throws:
      java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if the socket times out.
      java.io.IOException - if something wrong happens during the call to receive.

    • readMsg

      static java.lang.String readMsg​(java.nio.channels.SocketChannel wqClient, java.nio.ByteBuffer bBuff)
      Utility function to read a message from a NIO socket.
      Parameters:
      wqClient - the socket.
      bBuff - the socket associated byte buffer.
      Returns:
      the message red.

    • writeMsg

      static void writeMsg​(java.lang.String msg, java.nio.ByteBuffer bBuff, java.nio.channels.SocketChannel socket)
      Utility function to write a message in a NIO TCP socket.
      Parameters:
      msg - the message to write
      bBuff - the socket associated byte buffer.
      socket - the socket.

    • run

      void run()
      The run method.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
